channel.title: PSP select button!
channel.description:
Hai! Well my psp select button is broken.
Details: You cant see on the outside that it is broken as it looks excactly the same as the start button, nothing pushed down. But! Whenever i enter letters into the internet browser or a network connection it switchs input modes rapidly which proves the select button is... well fucked. Also the home button, volume and screen brightness randomly go down.
Question: How can i fix this? Do i need to take the face plate off and just play around with those buttons? I think somthing has been stuck there. What do i do?![br][size=1]Posted at: October 10, 2006, 12:07:14 PM[/size][hr]You really should add a bump feature mopar...
